package.name: gcc52
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build SED=sed export SED export CC="/usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54" export CXX="/usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54" if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] && which distcc ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc /usr/local/gcc54/bin/gcc54" export CXX="distcc /usr/local/gcc54/bin/g++54" fi ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/usr/local/${PKGNAME} \ --enable-shared \ --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit \ --enable-clocale=gnu --enable-languages=c,c++,fortran,java,lto,objc,obj-c++,go \ --disable-multilib --with-system-zlib --program-suffix=52 --disable-bootstrap if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then pump make -j $jobcount else make -j 4 fi
